structure: select name,sql from sqlite_master where type in ('table','view');
historyByClass:
SELECT id,timestamp,title,SeatsTaken,SeatsOpen,ClassCapacity,WaitlistTotal,WaitlistCapacity 
  from history,classes 
  where history.ClassNumber = classes.ClassNumber 
  LIMIT 100;
historyBigByClass:
SELECT id,timestamp,title,SeatsTaken,SeatsOpen,ClassCapacity,WaitlistTotal,WaitlistCapacity 
  from history,classes 
  where history.ClassNumber = classes.ClassNumber 
  and history.ClassCapacity > 1 
  group by classes.ClassNumber 
  LIMIT 100;
historyClassFull:
SELECT id,timestamp,title,SeatsTaken,SeatsOpen,ClassCapacity,WaitlistTotal,WaitlistCapacity  
   from history,classes  
   where history.ClassNumber = classes.ClassNumber  
   and history.ClassCapacity = history.SeatsTaken 
   group by classes.ClassNumber;
historyClassFullBAE:
SELECT id,timestamp,title,SeatsTaken,SeatsOpen,ClassCapacity,WaitlistTotal,WaitlistCapacity  
   from history,classes  
   where history.ClassNumber = classes.ClassNumber  
   and history.ClassCapacity = history.SeatsTaken 
   and history.WaitListTotal = history.WaitListCapacity 
   group by classes.ClassNumber;
historyClassStillEmpty:
SELECT id,timestamp,title,SeatsTaken,SeatsOpen,ClassCapacity,WaitlistTotal,WaitlistCapacity  
   from history,classes  
   where history.ClassNumber = classes.ClassNumber  
   and history.SeatsTaken = 0 
   group by classes.ClassNumber;
historyThatChanged:
SELECT a.* 
 FROM history AS a 
 WHERE a.seatstaken <> 
   ( SELECT b.seatstaken 
   FROM history AS b 
   WHERE a.classnumber = b.classnumber 
   AND a.id > b.id 
   ORDER BY b.id DESC 
   LIMIT 1 
 )
historyThatChangedByTitle:
SELECT title,timestamp,SeatsTaken,SeatsOpen,ClassCapacity,WaitlistTotal,WaitlistCapacity 
 FROM history AS a, classes 
 where a.ClassNumber = classes.ClassNumber 
 and a.seatstaken <> 
   ( SELECT b.seatstaken 
   FROM history AS b 
   WHERE a.classnumber = b.classnumber 
   AND a.id > b.id 
   ORDER BY b.id DESC 
   LIMIT 1 
 )
historyCapacityChangedByTitle:
SELECT title,x.classnumber,timestamp,ClassCapacity,new FROM 
 (SELECT title,a.classnumber,ClassCapacity  
  FROM history AS a, classes 
  where a.ClassNumber = classes.ClassNumber  
  and (title LIKE 'ITEC%' or title LIKE 'COSC%') 
  and a.ClassCapacity <>  
    ( SELECT b.ClassCapacity  
    FROM history AS b  
    WHERE a.classnumber = b.classnumber  
    AND a.id < b.id  
    ORDER BY b.id ASC  
    LIMIT 1 
  ) ) as x 
 inner join  
 (SELECT a.classnumber, timestamp,ClassCapacity as 'new' 
  FROM history AS a, classes 
  where a.ClassNumber = classes.ClassNumber  
  and (title LIKE 'ITEC%' or title LIKE 'COSC%') 
  and a.ClassCapacity <>  
    ( SELECT b.ClassCapacity  
    FROM history AS b  
    WHERE a.classnumber = b.classnumber  
    AND a.id > b.id  
    ORDER BY b.id DESC  
    LIMIT 1 
  ) ) as y 
 on x.classnumber = y.classnumber
statsClassBySize:
select ClassCapacity, count(*) as ynum 
  from history 
  group by ClassCapacity 
  order by ClassCapacity asc;
statsClassBySizeByNum:
select ClassCapacity, count(*) as ynum 
  from history 
  group by ClassCapacity 
  order by ynum desc;
statsClassEmptyBySize:
select ClassCapacity, count(*) as ynum 
  from history 
  where SeatsTaken = 0 
   group by ClassCapacity 
  order by ClassCapacity asc;
statsClassEmptyBySize1:
SELECT substr( title, 0, 5) as field,count(*) as pienum from 
 (SELECT id,timestamp,title 
    from history,classes   
    where history.ClassNumber = classes.ClassNumber   
    and history.SeatsTaken = 0  
    and ClassCapacity = 1 
    group by history.ClassNumber 
 ) 
 group by field;
statsClassEmptyBySize5:
SELECT substr( title, 0, 5) as field,count(*) as pienum from 
 (SELECT id,timestamp,title 
    from history,classes   
    where history.ClassNumber = classes.ClassNumber   
    and history.SeatsTaken = 0  
    and ClassCapacity = 5 
    group by history.ClassNumber 
 ) 
 group by field;

SELECT substr( title, 0, 5) as field,count(*) as pienum from

    from history,classes   
    where history.ClassNumber = classes.ClassNumber   
    and history.SeatsTaken = 0  
    and ClassCapacity = 6 
    group by history.ClassNumber 
 ) 
 group by field;
statsClassEmptyBySize10:
SELECT substr( title, 0, 5) as field,count(*) as pienum from 
 (SELECT id,timestamp,title 
    from history,classes   
    where history.ClassNumber = classes.ClassNumber   
    and history.SeatsTaken = 0

statsClassEmptyBySize12:
SELECT substr( title, 0, 5) as field,count(*) as pienum from 
 (SELECT id,timestamp,title 
    from history,classes   
    where history.ClassNumber = classes.ClassNumber   
    and history.SeatsTaken = 0  
    and ClassCapacity = 12 
    group by history.ClassNumber

 group by field;
statsClassEmptyBySizeParam:
SELECT substr( title, 0, 5) as field,count(*) as pienum from 
 (SELECT id,timestamp,title 
    from history,classes   
    where history.ClassNumber = classes.ClassNumber   
    and history.SeatsTaken = 0  
    and ClassCapacity > XYZ 
    group by history.ClassNumber 
 ) 
 group by field;
sqlHistoSingle:
SELECT x.timestamp as timestamp, x.openings as 'CIS435-001' 
 FROM (SELECT timestamp,(SeatsOpen-waitlisttotal) as openings,  
 (  
   SELECT COUNT(*)  
   FROM history b  
   WHERE a.timestamp >= b.timestamp  
 and b.classnumber = 3136  
 ) AS rnum  
 FROM history a  
 where a.classnumber = 3136) as x;
sqlHistoMultiple2:
SELECT x.timestamp as timestamp,x.openings as 'CIS435-001', 
   y.openings as 'ITEC440-101' 
FROM (SELECT timestamp,(SeatsOpen-waitlisttotal) as openings, 
( 
  SELECT COUNT(*) 
  FROM history b 
  WHERE a.timestamp >= b.timestamp 
and b.classnumber = 3136 
) AS rnum 
FROM history a 
where a.classnumber = 3136) x 
  LEFT JOIN (SELECT timestamp,(SeatsOpen-waitlisttotal) as openings, 
( 
  SELECT COUNT(*) 
  FROM history b 
  WHERE a.timestamp >= b.timestamp 
and b.classnumber = 3143 
) AS rnum 
FROM history a 
where a.classnumber = 3143) y 
   ON x.rnum=y.rnum;
sqlHistoMultiple3:
SELECT x.timestamp as timestamp,x.openings as 'CIS435-001',  
   y.openings as 'ITEC440-101', z.openings as 'ITEC345-851' 
 FROM  
 (SELECT timestamp,(SeatsOpen-waitlisttotal) as openings,  
 (SELECT COUNT(*)  
   FROM history b  
   WHERE a.timestamp >= b.timestamp  
 and b.classnumber = 3136  
 ) AS rnum  
 FROM history a  
 where a.classnumber = 3136) as x  
   JOIN  
 (SELECT timestamp,(SeatsOpen-waitlisttotal) as openings,  
 (SELECT COUNT(*)  
   FROM history b  
   WHERE a.timestamp >= b.timestamp  
 and b.classnumber = 3143  
 ) AS rnum  
 FROM history a  
 where a.classnumber = 3143) as y  
   JOIN  
 (SELECT timestamp,(SeatsOpen-waitlisttotal) as openings,  
 (SELECT COUNT(*)  
   FROM history b  
   WHERE a.timestamp >= b.timestamp  
 and b.classnumber = 5077  
 ) AS rnum  
 FROM history a  
 where a.classnumber = 5077) as z 
   ON x.rnum=y.rnum 
   and y.rnum=z.rnum;
